website_summaries.verdict: One of the most memorable Fila sneakers ever, the Fila MB is back in 2019 with new colorways and a vintage flair. Its 1990s basketball-inspired silhouette can freshen up any casual ensemble. Additionally, at $100, these kicks are affordable, with users declaring the shoe as worth the price.Reviewers love the sneaker's look and feel, praising its supportive, lightweight, and high-quality structure. Overall, this shoe can be worth the space in anyone's closet, given its trendy throwback vibe and bold appeal.
pros: According to most purchasers, the sneaker looks great and cool with its retro basketball style
This shoe from the Fila casual collection is very comfortable, many buyers have observed
More than a handful of users have revealed that the Fila MB is extremely supportive
Plenty of commenters share that they have received many compliments for the kicks
The Fila MB is reasonably priced, with several reviewers finding it to be worth the buy
According to quite a few reviewers, the Fila MB is made up of excellent quality materials
Some purchasers laud the sneaker for being lightweight despite its bulky look
cons: The shoe comes in a limited number of color options

customer_reviews.title: They are good
customer_reviews.text: Received my product in about a week... It came with 1 shoe in perfect condition, and the other one, it's good and looks good as well but it had a few stains on the white part... For the majority, its barely noticeable. You'd have to really look at the sneaker up close to look at the stains but they are still comfortable, and look amazing. I recommend them. One of a kind FILA sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: The1andonly

customer_reviews.title: Look and wear great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they look even better in person. They are comfortable and wear great in my opinion. The only thing I would say is that if you have a wide foot like I do I would get a half size bigger, they are a bit snug. Usually a 12 is too big for me, so I got an 11.5 and the length is perfect they are just a little snug if you are used to having a little more room in your shoe. Other than that they are as awesome as I always thought they would be! classic Mashburns!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Comfortable and A Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Have bought 4 pairs in different colors now,and can say they are Comfortable, Stylish and made well.Have even bought a couple of the varuant styles because of how glad I was about the price and the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Fila Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love these, got them for a discount which is rare for my size and they fit just fine. I will say they fit EXACTLY as expected so if you want a little extra room order a half size up. They are suede so they crease a little easily but they still are nice. That just means don’t wear them to death if you care about preserving your sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sneaks. My teenager loved them. I wanna get a pair for myself! His size was a great price too compared to the others!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great retro!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe.....True suede and these are quite comfortable........They are bulky but I like that and they are pretty light too!....Better looking in person.....Can be worn for hooping and for just chillin.
customer_reviews.author: coolvee

customer_reviews.title: Beauty of a hi-top shoe. Love Love Love this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fashion of the shoe. Fit great, look great. I wear them to work. Love the Fila brand overall. I have some foot problems and find the Fila shoe provides very good arch support. If Fila keeps making fashionable hi-tops I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Owren

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these as a gift. Blk white file fits well.
customer_reviews.author: jilljanell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the suede look in black. Comfortable fit right out the box. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JNew

customer_reviews.title: I love them, they fit perfectly and I've received many ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they fit perfectly and I've received many compliments on them. When opening the box on the sides where the white part of the design is, I noticed creases. Then on the black part was a small tear. Its unnoticeable to the naked eye and not much of a big deal but I felt like you could have informed me if they were used or not
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice fitting shoe. They look great when I wear them. I've received several compliments and I've only had them for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Got it cheaper on here than I did in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Marlan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fila is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought for myself. And product is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Richard jensen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i love it but because of its well cushioned designed its a bit tight
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable omg and looks just like the picture. As a female they look a little bulky but still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Bom of a shoe
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a pair of Fila before I didn't know what I was missing!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Blount

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe , good support, comfortable. They arrive very fast.
customer_reviews.author: bruce thiang

customer_reviews.title: Must haves.... hands down
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and very comfortable. The suede is of good quality, and the rubber sole is nice and chunky for support. The inside is smooth fabric with sufficient padding, and despite how bulky it looks, it's actually very light weight and feels really good to walk in. It also looks visually appealing and also comes with a set of red laces, which makes the shoe stand out even more. Overall, some of the best shoes I've had in a while and couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Broushon B.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought a men’s 10.5 and my husband couldn’t even get his foot in. It just fit my son who is a size 9. So buy 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Om Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and looks exactly like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them. Great fit and looks exactly like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Sneaks are super cool, fit great and the seller ships lightning fast! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Philly!

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth What I Paid
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and are comfortable. Fair condition, but came with noticeable stains and creases from wear. They are not worth what I paid because of that. They should’ve been about $70 instead of $105.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiancé and he loves them. He wears a size 9 & that’s the size I got but they were a just a bit fitted. Not ‘uncomfortable’ fitted, but on the snug side so if u wear say a 10, for comfort, you may want to get a 10 & a half.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe for our at a great price and I have gotten so many compliment on it. They do run a bit small do o suggest like a half size up. Fila is back in business...
customer_reviews.author: Corey Mason

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed with these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pairs of shoes I've ever owned and , snug fitting but not too tight.. you do have to half size up... and they're eye catchers , I've received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: YESSS
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, super cute and nice. I bought them for my boyfriend to go with his fila joggers and they are amazing together!
customer_reviews.author: Ramisha Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker heads
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is dope, but I’m a sneaker head and could not pass these colors up. I’m a Fila and Nike lover
customer_reviews.author: Kevin leitch

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Fancy
customer_reviews.text: Loved my new kicks. They looked and fit great and where wide enough I have wide feet .they where delivered on time good product
customer_reviews.author: Pea

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes where packaged properly but when I opened the box there were multiple scuff marks like they have been warn already 😒
customer_reviews.author: Kjersten

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. I'm one of those people that aren't really into the Jordan hype. I like retros or shoes that everybody doesn't have. I also have the white pair and those stand out when I'm in a public place and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marlan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fila
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect just cut too small other than that I'd buy anytime
customer_reviews.author: Julius Mims

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe for the price ... Came with 2 different sized shoe strings other then that no problem 👌
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Price is cheaper than Dr Jay's where I had originally bought someone the same shoe last year. Perfect condition. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B & Erika

product_meta.title: Fila Mens MB-M Mb
product_meta.description: Fila has reached back into the archives and brought back this timeless heritage basketball shoe. The styling, material and colors make the look fashionable and contemporary. A true inspiration combining function and fashion.
feature_bullets: Midsole - EVA for cushioning and comfort
Outsole - solid rubber provides traction and durability
Classic Heritage style with fashionable looks
Select distribution and unique product assortment
